title: Special rules for rooms and apartments
context: Warn a tenant that loud parties are strictly forbidden.

content.bestLine: Loud parties are strictly forbidden in the rooms.

neutral.text: Quiet hours are from 10 PM to 8 AM.
Keep the volume down after 10 PM.
No parties or loud events allowed.

formal.text: It is imperative that you refrain from loud gatherings.
Please be advised that noise levels must be kept to a minimum.
We strictly prohibit loud parties in our rooms.
You are expected to respect the quiet enjoyment of other guests.
Failure to comply with noise regulations may result in action.

dialogs.description: Warning a tenant about loud parties

lines.speaker: Hotel Manager
lines.text: I need to remind you that loud parties are strictly forbidden in the rooms.

lines.speaker: Tenant
lines.text: Okay, got it. We'll keep the noise down.

lines.speaker: Hotel Staff
lines.text: We've received a noise complaint about your room. Could you please keep the volume down?

lines.speaker: Tenant
lines.text: Sorry about that. We didn't realize it was getting too loud.
